channel.title: Color codes for changing Yell Command
channel.description:
I'm using Impozzoes Source/Client just for fun and for me and my brother to play on and I was wondering how to change the color of the Yell. I am the Owner on the server and when i use the ::Yell command I'd like to change the color from black. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/xatg5w.png[/img] Also how to change the shadow.
[code] if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Java")) { c2.sendMessage("<col=3635>[Owner]</col><col=255><shad=15695415>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); [/spoiler][/code]

item.title: Color codes for changing Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

This uses decimal colour codes, You can make them here

http://www.mathsisfun.com/hexadecimal-decimal-colors.html

Read full topic
item.source: Color codes for changing Yell Command
